welcome_message_body: Welcome to Fair Lawn, where small-town charm meets big-city excitement! Known for its beautiful parks and friendly community, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves domestic flights for American Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves domestic flights for Delta Air Lines.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require periodic reconnection.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for 30 minutes per day.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linden Airport serves all commercial flights and is equipped with modern amenities for passenger convenience.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Linden Airport caters to private and charter flights, offering exclusive services and facilities for VIP passengers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Westchester County Apt Airport handles all commercial flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Westchester County Apt Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Main international terminal for various airlines

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: Domestic and international flights for United Airlines

terminals.name: Terminal 8
terminals.description: Domestic and international flights for American Airlines

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport
